trans-unit.source: Represents a combination of a standard button on the left and a drop-down button on the right, or the other way around if the value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> is <see langword="Yes" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma combinação de um botão padrão à esquerda e um botão de lista suspensa à direita ou vice-versa se o valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> for <see langword="Yes" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> combines button and drop-down button functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> combina a funcionalidade de botão suspenso e o botão.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItem%2A> property to synchronize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of the chosen drop-down item with the item shown on the button.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItem%2A> propriedade para sincronizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos do item de lista suspensa escolhido do item exibido no botão.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> class with the specified image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> com a imagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> class with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> com o texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> class with the specified text and image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> com o texto e a imagem especificados.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> quando o usuário clica no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> class with the specified display text, image, and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> com o texto de exibição, a imagem e o manipulador de eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> array of controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> de controles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> class with the specified text, image, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> array.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> com o texto, a imagem e a matriz <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> quando o usuário clica no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> class with the specified display text, image, <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event handler, and name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> com o texto de exibição, a imagem, o manipulador de eventos <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> e o nome especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether default or custom <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> text is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o texto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> padrão ou personalizado é exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> text is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o texto padrão <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> for exibido; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.AutoToolTip%2A> property to `false` to display custom text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.AutoToolTip%2A> propriedade `false` para exibir o texto personalizado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the standard button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e local da parte de um botão padrão de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the size and location of the standard button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o tamanho e o local da parte de botão padrão de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the standard button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a parte do botão padrão de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> é clicada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.ButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.ButtonClick> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> named `ToolStripSplitButton1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> chamado `ToolStripSplitButton1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.ButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.ButtonClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the standard button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a parte do botão padrão de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> é clicada duas vezes.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the button portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a parte do botão do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> está no estado pressionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the button portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is in the pressed state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a parte de botão de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> está no pressionado estado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the standard button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is selected or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DropDownButtonPressed" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a parte do botão de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> está selecionada ou a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DropDownButtonPressed" /> é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is selected or whether <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DropDownButtonPressed" /> is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a parte de botão de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> estiver selecionada ou se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DropDownButtonPressed" /> é <see langword="true" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: A new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> genérico para o qual os eventos podem ser definidos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to display the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> that is defined as the default.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> definida como o padrão será exibida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> that is activated when the control is first selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a parte do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> ativada quando o controle é selecionado pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Forms.ToolStripItem" /> representing the portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> that is activated when first selected.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que representa a parte do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> que é ativado quando selecionado pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItem%2A>, the ENTER key activates the button.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItem%2A>, a tecla ENTER ativa o botão.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the ENTER key activates the drop-down.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a tecla ENTER ativa na lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItem%2A> property to synchronize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of the chosen drop-down item with the item shown on the button.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItem%2A> propriedade para sincronizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos do item de lista suspensa escolhido do item exibido no botão.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItem" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItem" /> foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItemChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> named `ToolStripSplitButton1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> chamado `ToolStripSplitButton1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.DefaultItemChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether items on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> are hidden after they are clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os itens de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> ficam ocultos depois que recebem um clique.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the items are hidden after they are clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os itens estiverem ocultos depois que eles são clicados; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location, in screen coordinates, of the drop-down button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e local, em coordenadas da tela, da parte do botão de menu de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the size and location of the drop-down button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o tamanho e o local da parte de botão suspenso de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />, em coordenadas de tela.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the drop-down portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a parte suspensa do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> está no estado pressionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the drop-down portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is in the pressed state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a parte suspensa do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> está no pressionado estado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the drop-down button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se parte do botão de menu de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the drop-down button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o menu suspenso botão parte de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> selecionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the drop-down button portion of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, da parte do botão de menu de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the width in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa a largura em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default is 11.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 11.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/includes/net-2015-md.md)], the default value is based on the DPI setting of the device running the app.
trans-unit.target: Começando com o [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/includes/net-2015-md.md)], o valor padrão baseia-se a configuração de DPI do dispositivo executando o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que zero (0).

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área com tamanho personalizado de um controle.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> pode ser ajustado.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, que representa a largura e a altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.ButtonClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.ButtonClick" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.OnButtonClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.OnButtonClick%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.OnButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.OnButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.OnButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.OnButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled" /> property is <see langword="true" />, calls the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.OnButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled" /> for <see langword="true" />, chamará o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.OnButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> que representa a chave a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a chave foi processada pelo item; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the ENTER and SPACEBAR keys in order to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para manipular as teclas ENTER e barra de espaços para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> evento.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> is not enabled, this method calls the base class implementation instead.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> não é habilitado, este método chama a implementação da classe base em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the item is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado somente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> método indica que o item não está processando a chave.

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: para todas as janelas de herança de classes para chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see langword="AllWindows" /> valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> método em uma classe derivada, a implementação de substituição deve retornar <see langword="true" /> para indicar que ele processou a chave.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas raramente, ou nunca, precisará substituir este método.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the boundaries of the separator between the standard and drop-down button portions of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites do separador entre as partes padrão e do botão de menu de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the size and location of the separator.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o tamanho e o local do separador.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.SplitterBounds%2A> property to do custom painting.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton.SplitterBounds%2A> propriedade fazer pintura personalizada.
